policy-sessions.title: 議題釐清工作坊 / 維基寫作式工作坊
policy-sessions.intro: 雙工作坊同步進行，見 https://hackmd.io/Oy5ioZhxRmiKu0b9sUQDOw

hychen.speaker: hychen
hychen.name: Hychen
hychen.intro:
Chen Hsin-Yi is the founder of TrustableAI, a research company to eusure AI is trustable with anyone who cares about computational morality.

He has a strong background in participating with open source communities and projects in Taiwan, by hosting events and contributing software patchs to different communities.

Reke.speaker: Reke
Reke.name: 王則文
Reke.intro: 台灣維基媒體協會現任祕書長，維基百科寫作資歷超過 10 年。
